Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Lobby
public class Lobby extends Object
Class Lobby manages all the interaction between all the players of a lobby and the controller.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor Lobby creates a new empty Lobby instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby()
      Constructor Lobby creates a new empty Lobby instance.

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(GameParams gameParams, SocketClientHandler socketClientHandler, int idClients)
      Constructor Lobby creates a new Lobby instance.
      Parameters:
      gameParams - GameParams - the message from which the parameters used to create the lobby are taken.
      socketClientHandler - SocketClientHandler - the socket of the client.
      idClients - int - the id of the client who has sent the message.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer(Join join, SocketClientHandler socketClientHandler, int idClients)
      Method AddPlayer verify the correctness of the Join's parameters and adds a player to the lobby.
      Parameters:
      join - Join - the message where all the parameters are contained.
      socketClientHandler - SocketClientHandler - the socket of the client.
      idClients - int - the client's id who sent the message.
      Returns:
      a boolean that notify the server if the addition of the player is corrected.

    • checkReconnection

      public int checkReconnection(Join join, SocketClientHandler socketClientHandler, int clientId)
      Method checkReconnection handles the re-connection of a player.
      Parameters:
      join - Join - the message sent by the player.
      socketClientHandler - SocketClientHandler - the new player's socket.
      clientId - int - The new client's id.
      Returns:
      an int - the old value of the client's id that will be removed from the server.

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection(int clientId)
      Method handleDisconnection is used to disconnect a player from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      clientId - int - the client's id of the player who has to be disconnected.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String nickname, AnswerWithString answer)
      Method sendMessage sends an Answer message to the client which has the nickname given by parameter.
      Parameters:
      nickname - String - the nickname of the player who will receive the message.
      answer - AnswerWithString - the message that will be sent to the client.

    • sendMessageToOthers

      public void sendMessageToOthers(String nickname, AnswerWithString answer)
      Method sendMessageToOthers sends an Answer message to all the clients except the one whose nickname is given by parameter.
      Parameters:
      nickname - String - the nickname of the player who will not receive the message.
      answer - AnswerWithString - the message that will be sent to the clients.

    • sendMessageToAll

      public void sendMessageToAll(Answer answer)
      Method sendMessageToAll sends an Answer message to all the active clients.
      Parameters:
      answer - AnswerWithString - the message that will be sent to the clients.

    • gameEnded

      public void gameEnded()
      Method gameEnded sets the status of the game to ended.

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage(Request request, int clientId)
      Method handleMessage forward the message to the controller if the game is started.
      Parameters:
      request - Request - the message sent by the client.
      clientId - int - the sender's id.

    • isPresent

      public boolean isPresent(String nickname)
      Method isPresent returns if there is in the lobby a player with the given nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - String - the nickname that will be checked.
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if the nickname is in the lobby, otherwise false.

    • getGameStatus

      public GameStatus getGameStatus()
      Method getGameStatus return the status of the game.
      Returns:
      GameStatus - the status of the game.

      Returns:

      Method getColorTowers returns the List of the already chosen towers' color.
      Returns:
      ArrayList ColorT the color of the tower already chosen.

    • getNicknames

      public ArrayList<String> getNicknames()
      Method getNicknames returns the List of the taken nickname.
      Returns:
      ArrayList String the nickname already taken.

    • getNumPlayers

      public int getNumPlayers()
      Method getNumPlayers returns the number of game's players.
      Returns:
      an int - the number of game's players.

    • isMode

      public boolean isMode()
      Method isMode returns if the game is expert or basic.
      Returns:
      a boolean - true if the game is in expertMode, false otherwise.
